name: infrahub-qa
topic:
Welcome to the Infrahub Questions Forum! This is a space to ask questions, share solutions, and support each other with anything related to Infrahub. To keep the channel productive and helpful, please follow these guidelines:

1. Check Existing Topics First

	‚Ä¢	Before posting, use the search bar to see if your question has already been asked and answered.
	‚Ä¢	Avoid duplicate questions to keep the forum tidy and focused.

2. Use Descriptive Titles

	‚Ä¢	Title your question clearly and specifically (e.g., ‚ÄúIssue with InfraHub deployment on AWS‚Äù instead of ‚ÄúHelp needed‚Äù).
	‚Ä¢	This helps others understand the topic quickly and makes it easier to search for similar issues later.

3. Provide Details & Context

	‚Ä¢	Include necessary details like InfraHub version, environment setup, specific error messages, and any troubleshooting steps you‚Äôve already tried.
	‚Ä¢	The more context you provide, the easier it will be for others to help you accurately.

4. Stay on Topic

	‚Ä¢	Keep conversations within each topic focused on the original question. If a new issue arises, create a new topic.
	‚Ä¢	This keeps the forum organized and relevant.

5. Be Patient and Respectful

	‚Ä¢	Remember that everyone here is volunteering their time to help. Give people time to respond and always interact respectfully.
	‚Ä¢	Constructive feedback is welcome; personal attacks or rude behavior are not tolerated.

6. Follow-Up and Close Out Your Question

	‚Ä¢	If your question has been answered, mark it as resolved or leave a final comment to let others know the solution worked.
	‚Ä¢	This helps others who may have similar questions in the future.

7. No Self-Promotion or Spam

	‚Ä¢	Avoid promoting unrelated products, services, or Discord servers. This channel is strictly for InfraHub-related questions and discussions.

8. Use Code Blocks for Technical Information

	‚Ä¢	If you‚Äôre sharing logs, code snippets, or commands, use code blocks (wrap text in triple backticks like this) for better readability.

9. Ask for Clarification When Needed

	‚Ä¢	If someone‚Äôs response isn‚Äôt clear, politely ask for clarification. We‚Äôre here to help everyone understand InfraHub better.

10. Give Back to the Community

	‚Ä¢	If you find solutions or learn something useful, consider sharing it here. Your insights may help others with similar challenges.

Thank you for keeping our community helpful and supportive.
